## Definition Of Done

| Q                                 | A
| --------------------------------- | ---
| Added Specs                       | Todo
| Added Behats                      | Todo
| Changelog updated                 | Todo
| Migration script                  | -
| Documentation                     | -
| Fixed tickets                     | #... <!-- #-prefixed issue number(s), if any -->

`Todo`: Pending / Work in progress
`OK`: Done / Validated
`-`: Not needed
